sequence:
Operation: Christmas!

<size=45>Chapter 2: A Gift for Everyone</size>

scripts.say: Hold yer horses, Urakaze~! I'm not done yet!
My patience has run out! How on Earth can you spend over two hours picking out presents?!
I done told you, I got a lotta people to give to! 'sides, weren't you the one who talked 'bout givin' presents to everyone?
Grrr... F-fine. I'll be generous and give you another hour!
Hm? Good day, Sakura Empire destroyers. What seems to be the matter?
Why, if it ain't Warspite 'n Cygnet~ What're y'all here for?
To pick out some presents. Although we haven't decided on what to get yet.
G-greetings...
Aw heck, we can't have you cute girls in trouble, can we... If there's anythin' we can help ya with, just say the word.
No, please don't say the word! Ooshio's not even done picking presents for her own friends!
In that case, we'll leave you to it. But if you don't mind my asking... Are those outfits you're wearing this year's Christmas costumes?
It is. This is my handmade Warring States-style yuletide uniform. Hohoh, no need to tell me it looks good. I know it does~
Mine's handmade too! This here's my reindeer costume for deliverin' Christmas presents~ Ain't it brimmin' with holiday spirit?
I see... A handmade costume would be perfect for Christmas. The time required to make it is an issue, though...
W-we don't have time to make enough Christmas costumes for everybody!
... Gah, we won't get anywhere if we can't even decide what presents to get!
Maybe we should simply ask everyone what they want...
B-but then it won't be a surprise when they open their present...!
Then what do you suggest?
Maybe we could ask somebody from the Eagle Union...? Enterprise might have an idea, since she was Santa last year...
Ask someone else, eh? Well, we don't have any better ideas at the moment, so let's try it... Ladies, if you'll excuse us. Have a Merry Christmas!
You have one, too~ See ya 'round, Warspite~
